Package org.apache.jackrabbit.core.version

The version storage is currently implement using the normal storage of the repository.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
VersionSelector This Interface defines the version selector that needs to provide a version, given some hints and a version history
 

Class Summary
FrozenNode The FrozenNode class represents a node of type 'nt:frozen' and is created as such object in the ItemManager.
GenericVersionSelector This Class implements a generic version selector that either selects a version by name, label or creation date.
VersionHistoryImpl This Class implements a version history.
VersionImpl This Class implements the Version representation of the node.
VersionIteratorImpl This Class implements a VersionIterator that iterates over a version graph following the successor nodes.
VersionManager This Class implements...
 

Package org.apache.jackrabbit.core.version Description

The version storage is currently implement using the normal storage of the repository. For performance and scalability reasons, it will be probably stored externally later.
A lot of the versioning functionality is handled in the NodeImpl or VersionImpl itself, since it operates on internal properties and node of that nodes. This also might move to another class, eg. the VersionManager later.
